param.name: LABEL_AS_ID
param.label: Use Label as Identifier
param.help: Use training area labels as identifier in classification result, assumes all label values are integer numbers!

param.name: DO_MRMR
param.label: Minimum Redundancy Feature Selection
param.help: Use only features selected by the minimum Redundancy Maximum Relevance (mRMR) algorithm

param.name: mRMR_DISCRETIZE
param.label: Discretization
param.help: uncheck this means no discretizaton (i.e. data is already integer)

param.name: mRMR_THRESHOLD
param.label: Discretization Threshold
param.help: a double number of the discretization threshold; set to 0 to make binarization

param.name: RF_TREE_SAMPLES
param.label: Samples per Tree
param.help: Specifies the fraction of the total number of samples used per tree for learning.

param.name: RF_REPLACE
param.label: Sample with Replacement
param.help: Sample from training population with or without replacement?

param.name: RF_SPLIT_MIN_SIZE
param.label: Minimum Node Split Size
param.help: Number of examples required for a node to be split. Choose 1 for complete growing.

param.name: RF_STRATIFICATION
param.label: Stratification
param.help: Specifies stratification strategy. Either none, equal amount of class samples, or proportional to fraction of class samples.
